pullRequest.title: New method getAllSponsoredMembersAndTheirSponsors
pullRequest.bodyText:
New method getAllSponsoredMembersAndTheirSponsors was added. It is similar to
getSponsoredMembersAndTheirSponsors but doesn’t filter members that are not
sponsored by principal.

nodes.bodyText: Please keep the old politic getSponsoredMembersAndTheirSponsors_Vo_policy for this method. It is because the GUI needs it to resolve authorization.

commit.message:
